context_bundle.summary: Configuring monorepo architecture with proper tooling
context_bundle.content:
Monorepo configuration for multi-package projects.

Structure:
/packages - Individual packages
/apps - Applications using packages
/tools - Build and dev tooling
/docs - Documentation

Tooling:
- Turborepo/Nx for build orchestration
- pnpm workspaces for dependency management
- Changesets for versioning

Benefits: Code sharing, atomic commits, unified CI
Challenges: Build times, git performance at scale
